field.name: summary
field.value: Castle Validation should make propertyname AND friendlyname available in ErrorSummary

field.name: description
field.value: Currently, if friendlyname is specified in a validation attribute, it still has to be the same as the property in your model. Friendlyname replaces the propertyname in the errorsummary. I would find it more intuitive and useful if InvalidProperties in the summary would always contain the propertyname and eg. InvalidPropertiesFriendlyName would contain the specified friendlyname.

comment.author: henry
comment.text:
If the dev provided a FriendlyName, it seems more probable that he wants to roll with the Friendly Name and not the property name.
Maybe a list containing only the raw property name.
Anyway, you're invited to reopen this discussion on the devel list if you want to.
